alert.note: Alert for Osage (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 8:53PM CDT until May 08 at 2:43AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Moreau River near Jefferson City. Gasconade River near Rich Fountain. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Maries River near Westphalia. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Maries River near Westphalia. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, County Road 610 begins flooding near the Indian Creek bridge near this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 10.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CDT Friday was 11.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 2.7 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg 7 pm Sat Sun Mon Tue Wed Maries River Westphalia 10.0 10.4 5.2 3.8 3.2 2.9 2.7 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
